title: Joyent SmartOS SMBIOC_TREE_RELE Use-After-Free Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
description:
This vulnerability allows local attackers to escalate privileges on vulnerable installations of Joyent SmartOS. An attacker must first obtain the ability to execute low-privileged code on the target system in order to exploit this vulnerability.
The specific flaw exists within the SMBIOC_TREE_RELE ioctl. The issue results from the lack of validating the existence of an object prior to performing operations on the object. An attacker can leverage this vulnerability to execute code under the context of the host OS.
addtionnal_details: Joyent has issued an update to correct this vulnerability. More details can be found at:https://help.joyent.com/hc/en-us/articles/360000124928
timeline:
2017-08-16 - Vulnerability reported to vendor
2018-02-12 - Coordinated public release of advisory
2018-02-12 - Advisory Updated
